General.Name: FreeMs Corporation
General.Description: FreeMs Corporation manufactures and sells heavy construction equipment. It also offers computers and peripherals, network equipment, LCD modules, financial terminals, and electronic equipment. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bucheon-si, South Korea.

0.Name: Mr. Heung-Sik  Park
0.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Pres and Representative Director
